title: Complex Wishart distribution
summary: In statistics, the complex Wishart distribution is a complex version of the Wishart distribution.  It is the distribution of n {\displaystyle n} times the sample Hermitian covariance matrix of n {\displaystyle n} zero-mean independent Gaussian random variables.  It has support for p Ã— p {\displaystyle p\times p} Hermitian positive definite matrices.[1]
